segments.text: We're supposed to check in at the Air China's counter 30 minutes before take-off , Joe .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know . The boarding time on the ticket says 17:05 , and now it's 16:15 . I guess we have plenty of time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do we need to show our ID cards when checking in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can check it and hand carry the small bags . And we have to open each for inspection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are they going to frisk all the passengers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so.We certainly don't want a hijack to happen on the plane today .
segments.speaker: S2
